meanings.definition: A soldier armed with a carbine.
meanings.sent1: The carabinier stood guard at the entrance.
meanings.sent2: The carabinier patrolled the perimeter of the camp.
meanings.sent3: The carabinier's uniform was so crisp, it could probably stand on its own!
meanings.sent4: The carabinier's presence was like a shield protecting the troops.
meanings.sent5: The carabinier's duty was to ensure the safety of the soldiers.

meanings.definition: A member of a cavalry unit armed with a carbine.
meanings.sent1: As a carabinier, he rode swiftly on horseback.
meanings.sent2: The carabinier led the charge into battle.
meanings.sent3: The carabinier's horse seemed to have a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: The carabinier's determination was as strong as his steed.
meanings.sent5: The carabinier's skill in combat was unmatched.

meanings.definition: A type of hook or clip used in mountaineering or rock climbing.
meanings.sent1: The carabinier securely fastened the rope to the cliff.
meanings.sent2: She relied on the carabinier to keep her safe during the climb.
meanings.sent3: The carabinier looked like a tiny metal horseshoe!
meanings.sent4: The carabinier was the link between safety and danger.
meanings.sent5: The carabinier clicked into place, holding everything together.
